name: Air Conditioning and Refrigeration Repair Shops
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that service and repair household and commercial air
conditioning, and refrigeration systems.
For merchants that service and repair small household appliances,
use MCC 7629.
For merchants that service and repair large household appliances,
use MCC 7699.
